newsitem.title: USA: Blue chips rally on tech-stock strength, rate cuts.
newsitem.headline: Blue chips rally on tech-stock strength, rate cuts.

text.p: Blue-chip stocks were swept higher Thursday by renewed strength in technology shares and surprisingly large cuts in European interest rates.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow Jones industrial average ended up 43.28 points at 5,733.10, putting the index about 45 points from its record high of 5,778.00 set on May 22. In the broader market, advancing issues outnumbered declines by a 14-8 margin on moderately active volume of 356 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
